item.description:
I'm hosting a special game night this coming Saturday, special because it's not on the usual day and special because I'd prefer to limit it to four people so that we can get a few particular games to the table. Homesteaders, Carson City, Age of Industry and Egizia are all on the list of titles I'd like to play on Saturday, and other than Age of Industry, all of them have a limit of four players.

RSVP if you're in. (I'll send out a note when three folks have RSVPed.) Gaming starts at 7:30 or a bit afterward depending on me getting a certain little boy to bed on time.

Eric
item.name: Gaming in Concord, NH â€“ special Saturday event
